Data Fields
l3fwRegionConfigParams Struct Reference
IP » L3 Firewall

Structure contains configuration parameters for L3 FW region. More...

#include <l3fw.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t regionId
 
uint32_t targetBaseAddr
 
uint32_t regionStartAddr
 
uint32_t regionEndAddr
 
uint32_t regionPermission
 

Detailed Description

Structure contains configuration parameters for L3 FW region.

Field Documentation

uint32_t l3fwRegionConfigParams::regionEndAddr

End Address (byte address) for the region. 4 kB aligned address.

uint32_t l3fwRegionConfigParams::regionId

L3 Firewall Region ID to configure

uint32_t l3fwRegionConfigParams::regionPermission

Region access permissions. Refer 'MRM permission region*' macros for more details.

uint32_t l3fwRegionConfigParams::regionStartAddr

Start Address (byte address) for the region. 4 kB aligned address. Ignored when RegionId = 0.

uint32_t l3fwRegionConfigParams::targetBaseAddr

L3 Firewall Target Module Base Address
